title: Stalked By A Fiend Worse Than Any Elm Street Nightmare
teaser: In "Still Alice," Julianne Moore has each thing that defines her — to herself, to her family — devoured by early-onset Alzheimer's disease. It's a splendid performance, says critic Kenneth Turan.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
